name: weather_info
description: A weather data service that provides current weather conditions for specified locations. Returns comprehensive weather metrics including temperature, wind conditions, humidity, and precipitation. Can accept both city names and coordinates. Essential for weather-dependent applications and location-based services.

location.description: The location to retrieve weather information for (city name or coordinates)

examples: what's the weather like in Paris

location.description: The location the weather information is for

weather_summary.description: A brief summary of the current weather conditions

wind_speed.description: The current wind speed in km/h
